product_name: NRS Hydroskin 0.5 Shorts with Skirt - Women's
long_description: An immersible base layer, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shorts with Skirt offer just the right amount of warmth for cool days and cool water without feeling bulky or restrictive. 0.5 mm Terraprene(TM) neoprene with heat-reflecting titanium cuts the chill on cool days. 4-way-stretch exterior allows unrestricted movement, and the soft lining feels great against your skin. Skirt made of lightweight fabric adds a touch of style and modesty. Paddler-specific design allows unrestricted freedom of movement and puts seams where they won't cause irritation. 5 in. inseam and extended back give you extra coverage and protection from the elements while sitting. A zippered stash pocket in the waistband lets you keep small essentials handy. A drawcord in the waist cinches with a barrel lock for a secure fit. A durable water repellent exterior coating sheds water to help reduce evaporative cooling. The women's NRS HydroSkin 0.5 Shorts with Skirt have a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: An immersible base layer, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shorts with Skirt offer just the right amount of warmth for cool days and cool water without feeling bulky or restrictive.
